name: Passpie
tagline: Passpie: manage login credentials from the terminal
body: Passpie: Command-line password manager ======================================= [![Version](http://img.shields.io/pypi/v/passpie.svg?style=flat-square&label=latest%20version)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/passpie/) [![Build Status](http://img.shields.io/travis/marcwebbie/passpie.svg?style=flat-square)](https://travis-ci.org/marcwebbie/passpie) [![Windows Build Status](https://img.shields.io/appveyor/ci/marcwebbie/passpie.svg?style=flat-square&label=windows%20build)](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/marcwebbie/passpie) [![Coverage](http://img.shields.io/coveralls/marcwebbie/passpie.svg?style=flat-square)](https://coveralls.io/r/marcwebbie/passpie) Passpie is a command line tool to manage passwords from the terminal with a colorful and configurable interface. Use a master passphrase to decrypt login credentials, copy passwords to clipboard, syncronize with a git repository, check the state of your passwords, and more. Password files are encrypted using [GnuPG](https://www.gnupg.org/) and saved into yaml text files. Passpie supports **Linux**, **OSX** and **Windows**. What does it look like? Here is an example of a simple Passpie usage: passpie init passpie add foo@example.com --random passpie add bar@example.com --pattern "[0-9]{5}[a-z]{5}" passpie update foo@example --comment "Hello" passpie Outputs: ╒═════════════╤═════════╤════════════╤═══════════╕ │ Name │ Login │ Password │ Comment │ ╞═════════════╪═════════╪════════════╪═══════════╡ │ example.com │ bar │ ***** │ │ ├─────────────┼─────────┼────────────┼───────────┤ │ example.com │ foo │ ***** │ Hello │ ╘═════════════╧═════════╧════════════╧═══════════╛ > **note** > > Check remote passpie database <https://github.com/passpiedb>. Install ------- ``` sourceCode pip install passpie ``` Or if you are on a mac, install via [Homebrew](http://brew.sh): ``` sourceCode brew install passpie ``` Documentation ------------- Read full documentation on Check an example remote database: And visit our [![Gitter](https://img.shields.io/gitter/room/marcwebbie/passpie.svg?style=flat-square)](https://gitter.im/marcwebbie/passpie) Licence ![License](http://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-blue.svg?style=flat-square) -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Copyright (c) 2014-2016 Marcwebbie, <> Full license here: [LICENSE](https://github.com/marcwebbie/passpie/blob/master/LICENSE)
